authentication.description: API key must be included in x-api-key header for all endpoints except /api/status and /api/docs

endpoints.description: Get file system structure

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: path
optionalParameters.description: The path to retrieve (relative to source)

optionalParameters.name: source
optionalParameters.description: The source directory to use (data, systems, modules, etc.)

optionalParameters.name: recursive
optionalParameters.description: Whether to recursively list all subdirectories

endpoints.description: Upload a file to Foundry's file system (handles both base64 and binary data)

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: path
requiredParameters.description: The directory path to upload to

requiredParameters.name: filename
requiredParameters.description: The filename to save as

optionalParameters.name: source
optionalParameters.description: The source directory to use (data, systems, modules, etc.)

optionalParameters.name: mimeType
optionalParameters.description: The MIME type of the file

optionalParameters.name: overwrite
optionalParameters.description: Whether to overwrite an existing file

optionalParameters.name: fileData
optionalParameters.description: Base64 encoded file data (if sending as JSON) 250MB limit

endpoints.description: Download a file from Foundry's file system

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: path
requiredParameters.description: The full path to the file to download

optionalParameters.name: source
optionalParameters.description: The source directory to use (data, systems, modules, etc.)

optionalParameters.name: format
optionalParameters.description: The format to return the file in (binary, base64)

endpoints.description: Get all active headless Foundry sessions

endpoints.description: Get actor sheet HTML This endpoint retrieves HTML for an actor sheet based on the provided UUID or selected actor. Only works on Foundry version 12.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: uuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the actor to get the sheet for

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to get the sheet for the selected actor

optionalParameters.name: actor
optionalParameters.description: Whether this is an actor sheet (true) or item sheet (false)

optionalParameters.name: format
optionalParameters.description: The format to return the sheet in (html, json)

optionalParameters.name: scale
optionalParameters.description: The initial scale of the sheet

optionalParameters.name: tab
optionalParameters.description: The active tab index to open

optionalParameters.name: darkMode
optionalParameters.description: Whether to use dark mode for the sheet

endpoints.description: Get detailed information for a specific D&D 5e actor. Retrieves comprehensive details about an actor including stats, inventory, spells, features, and other character information based on the requested details array.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: Client ID for the Foundry world

requiredParameters.name: actorUuid
requiredParameters.description: UUID of the actor

requiredParameters.name: details
requiredParameters.description: Array of detail types to retrieve (e.g., ["resources", "items", "spells", "features"])

endpoints.description: Modify the charges for a specific item owned by an actor. Increases or decreases the charges/uses of an item in an actor's inventory. Useful for consumable items like potions, scrolls, or charged magic items.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: Client ID for the Foundry world

requiredParameters.name: actorUuid
requiredParameters.description: UUID of the actor who owns the item

requiredParameters.name: amount
requiredParameters.description: The amount to modify charges by (positive or negative)

optionalParameters.name: itemUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the specific item (optional if itemName provided)

optionalParameters.name: itemName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the item if UUID not provided (optional if itemUuid provided)

endpoints.description: Use a general ability for an actor. Triggers the use of any ability, feature, spell, or item for an actor. This is a generic endpoint that can handle various types of abilities.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: Client ID for the Foundry world

requiredParameters.name: actorUuid
requiredParameters.description: UUID of the actor using the ability

optionalParameters.name: abilityUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the specific ability (optional if abilityName provided)

optionalParameters.name: abilityName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the ability if UUID not provided (optional if abilityUuid provided)

optionalParameters.name: targetUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the target for the ability (optional)

optionalParameters.name: targetName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the target if UUID not provided (optional)

endpoints.description: Use a class or racial feature for an actor. Activates class features (like Action Surge, Rage) or racial features (like Dragonborn Breath Weapon) for a character.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: Client ID for the Foundry world

requiredParameters.name: actorUuid
requiredParameters.description: UUID of the actor using the feature

optionalParameters.name: abilityUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the specific feature (optional if abilityName provided)

optionalParameters.name: abilityName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the feature if UUID not provided (optional if abilityUuid provided)

optionalParameters.name: targetUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the target for the feature (optional)

optionalParameters.name: targetName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the target if UUID not provided (optional)

endpoints.description: Cast a spell for an actor. Casts a spell from the actor's spell list, consuming spell slots as appropriate. Handles cantrips, leveled spells, and spell-like abilities.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: Client ID for the Foundry world

requiredParameters.name: actorUuid
requiredParameters.description: UUID of the actor casting the spell

optionalParameters.name: abilityUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the specific spell (optional if abilityName provided)

optionalParameters.name: abilityName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the spell if UUID not provided (optional if abilityUuid provided)

optionalParameters.name: targetUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the target for the spell (optional)

optionalParameters.name: targetName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the target if UUID not provided (optional)

endpoints.description: Use an item for an actor. Activates an item from the actor's inventory, such as drinking a potion, using a magic item, or activating equipment with special properties.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: Client ID for the Foundry world

requiredParameters.name: actorUuid
requiredParameters.description: UUID of the actor using the item

optionalParameters.name: abilityUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the specific item (optional if abilityName provided)

optionalParameters.name: abilityName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the item if UUID not provided (optional if abilityUuid provided)

optionalParameters.name: targetUuid
optionalParameters.description: The UUID of the target for the item (optional)

optionalParameters.name: targetName
optionalParameters.description: The name of the target if UUID not provided (optional)

endpoints.description: Modify the experience points for a specific actor. Adds or removes experience points from an actor.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: Client ID for the Foundry world

requiredParameters.name: amount
requiredParameters.description: The amount of experience to add (can be negative)

optionalParameters.name: actorUuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the actor to modify

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Modify the selected token's actor

endpoints.description: Get all active encounters Retrieves a list of all currently active encounters in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

endpoints.description: Start a new encounter Initiates a new encounter in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: tokens
optionalParameters.description: Array of token UUIDs to include in the encounter

optionalParameters.name: startWithSelected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to start with selected tokens

optionalParameters.name: startWithPlayers
optionalParameters.description: Whether to start with players

optionalParameters.name: rollNPC
optionalParameters.description: Whether to roll for NPCs

optionalParameters.name: rollAll
optionalParameters.description: Whether to roll for all tokens

optionalParameters.name: name
optionalParameters.description: The name of the encounter (unused)

endpoints.description: Advance to the next turn in the encounter Moves the encounter to the next turn.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: encounter
optionalParameters.description: The ID of the encounter to advance (optional, defaults to current encounter)

endpoints.description: Advance to the next round in the encounter Moves the encounter to the next round.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: encounter
optionalParameters.description: The ID of the encounter to advance (optional, defaults to current encounter)

endpoints.description: Advance to the last turn in the encounter Moves the encounter to the last turn.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: encounter
optionalParameters.description: The ID of the encounter to advance (optional, defaults to current encounter)

endpoints.description: Advance to the last round in the encounter Moves the encounter to the last round.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: encounter
optionalParameters.description: The ID of the encounter to advance (optional, defaults to current encounter)

endpoints.description: End an encounter Ends the current encounter in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: encounter
optionalParameters.description: The ID of the encounter to end (optional, defaults to current encounter)

endpoints.description: Add tokens to an encounter Adds selected tokens or specified UUIDs to the current encounter.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: encounter
optionalParameters.description: The ID of the encounter to add tokens to (optional, defaults to current encounter)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to add selected tokens (optional, defaults to false)

optionalParameters.name: uuids
optionalParameters.description: The UUIDs of tokens to add (optional, defaults to empty array)

optionalParameters.name: rollInitiative
optionalParameters.description: Whether to roll initiative for the added tokens (optional, defaults to false)

endpoints.description: Get entity details This endpoint retrieves details of a specific entity.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: uuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity to retrieve (optional if selected=true)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to get the selected entity

optionalParameters.name: actor
optionalParameters.description: Return the actor of the specified entity

endpoints.description: Create a new entity This endpoint creates a new entity in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: entityType
requiredParameters.description: Document type of entity to create (Scene, Actor, Item, JournalEntry, RollTable, Cards, Macro, Playlist, ext.)

requiredParameters.name: data
requiredParameters.description: Data for the new entity

optionalParameters.name: folder
optionalParameters.description: Optional folder UUID to place the new entity in

endpoints.description: Update an existing entity This endpoint updates an existing entity in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: data
requiredParameters.description: Data to update the entity with

optionalParameters.name: uuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity to update (optional if selected=true)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to update the selected entity

optionalParameters.name: actor
optionalParameters.description: Update the actor of the selected entity when selected=true

endpoints.description: Delete an entity This endpoint deletes an entity from the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: uuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity to delete (optional if selected=true)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to delete the selected entity

endpoints.description: Give an item to an entity This endpoint gives an item to a specified entity. Optionally, removes the item from the giver.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: fromUuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity giving the item

optionalParameters.name: toUuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity receiving the item

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to give to the selected token's actor

optionalParameters.name: itemUuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the item to give (optional if itemName provided)

optionalParameters.name: itemName
optionalParameters.description: Name of the item to give (search with Quick Insert if UUID not provided)

optionalParameters.name: quantity
optionalParameters.description: Quantity of the item to give (negative values decrease quantity to 0)

endpoints.description: Remove an item from an entity This endpoint removes an item from a specified entity.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: actorUuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the actor to remove the item from (optional if selected=true)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to remove from the selected token's actor

optionalParameters.name: itemUuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the item to remove

optionalParameters.name: itemName
optionalParameters.description: Name of the item to remove (search with Quick Insert if UUID not provided)

optionalParameters.name: quantity
optionalParameters.description: Quantity of the item to remove

endpoints.description: Decrease an attribute This endpoint decreases an attribute of a specified entity.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: attribute
requiredParameters.description: The attribute data path to decrease (e.g., "system.attributes.hp.value")

requiredParameters.name: amount
requiredParameters.description: The amount to decrease the attribute by

optionalParameters.name: uuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity to decrease the attribute for (optional if selected=true)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to decrease the attribute for the selected entity

endpoints.description: Increase an attribute This endpoint increases an attribute of a specified entity.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: attribute
requiredParameters.description: The attribute data path to increase (e.g., "system.attributes.hp.value")

requiredParameters.name: amount
requiredParameters.description: The amount to increase the attribute by

optionalParameters.name: uuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity to increase the attribute for (optional if selected=true)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to increase the attribute for the selected entity

endpoints.description: Kill an entity Marks an entity as killed in the combat tracker, gives it a "dead" status, and sets its health to 0 in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: uuid
optionalParameters.description: UUID of the entity to kill (optional if selected=true)

optionalParameters.name: selected
optionalParameters.description: Whether to kill the selected entity

endpoints.description: Get all macros Retrieves a list of all macros available in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

endpoints.description: Execute a macro by UUID Executes a specific macro in the Foundry world by its UUID.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: uuid
requiredParameters.description: UUID of the macro to execute

optionalParameters.name: args
optionalParameters.description: Optional arguments to pass to the macro execution

endpoints.description: Get recent rolls Retrieves a list of up to 20 recent rolls made in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: limit
optionalParameters.description: Optional limit on the number of rolls to return (default is 20)

endpoints.description: Get the last roll Retrieves the most recent roll made in the Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

endpoints.description: Make a roll Executes a roll with the specified formula

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: formula
requiredParameters.description: The roll formula to evaluate (e.g., "1d20 + 5")

optionalParameters.name: flavor
optionalParameters.description: Optional flavor text for the roll

optionalParameters.name: createChatMessage
optionalParameters.description: Whether to create a chat message for the roll

optionalParameters.name: speaker
optionalParameters.description: The speaker for the roll

optionalParameters.name: whisper
optionalParameters.description: Users to whisper the roll result to

endpoints.description: Search entities This endpoint allows searching for entities in the Foundry world based on a query string. Requires Quick Insert module to be installed and enabled.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

requiredParameters.name: query
requiredParameters.description: Search query string

optionalParameters.name: filter
optionalParameters.description: Filter to apply (simple: filter="Actor", property-based: filter="key:value,key2:value2")

endpoints.description: Get the structure of the Foundry world Retrieves the folder and compendium structure for the specified Foundry world.

requiredParameters.name: clientId
requiredParameters.description: The ID of the Foundry client to connect to

optionalParameters.name: includeEntityData
optionalParameters.description: Whether to include full entity data or just UUIDs and names

optionalParameters.name: path
optionalParameters.description: Path to read structure from (null = root)

optionalParameters.name: recursive
optionalParameters.description: Whether to read down the folder tree

optionalParameters.name: recursiveDepth
optionalParameters.description: Depth to recurse into folders (default 5)

optionalParameters.name: types
optionalParameters.description: Types to return (Scene/Actor/Item/JournalEntry/RollTable/Cards/Macro/Playlist), can be comma-separated or JSON array

endpoints.description: This route is deprecated - use /structure with a path query parameter instead

requiredParameters.name: folderType
requiredParameters.description: Type of folder (Scene, Actor, Item, JournalEntry, RollTable, Cards, Macro, Playlist)

endpoints.description: Delete a folder

requiredParameters.name: clientId

optionalParameters.name: deleteAll
